Translations.Text: Glor DI est cxio heavens cxio ter! Li est Almighty Sagx
O vi kred vi dir ki vi ne do
abominable en sight DI est ti vi dir ki vi ne do
DI AM those BATAL EN His KAUXZ united 1 KOLON BRIK 1 MUR
Recall ti Moses dir al his popol O my popol do vi dolor me eben vi kon ti mi est di messenger vi? When ili deviated DI diverted their kor! Por DI ne direkt wicked popol

Recall ti Jesus fil Mary dir O Infan Israel mi est di messenger vi konfirm Torah bringing bon news messenger ven me nom est ecx lauxd (Ahmad.) Tiam when li montr them klar proofs ili dir This est profound magic
Who evil than unu est fabricates mensog DI li invit Submission? DI NE DIREKT evil POPOL
Ili wish put di light their busx. Sed DI insist upon perfekt His light en spit da disbelievers
Li send His messenger guidance prav religi far gxi dominate all religi en spit da idol worshipers
